question: Following representation P, Q and R denote few steps of Griffith Experiment. Identify the correct one(s).
**P.** R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
**Q.** S strain (Heat killed) -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
**R.** S strain (Heat killed) + R strain (Live) -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
explanation: P is incorrect (R strain is non-virulent). Q is incorrect (Heat killed S strain is non-virulent). R is correct due to the transforming principle where live R strain is transformed into virulent S strain.
